meanings.definition: The state or quality of being awake.
meanings.sent1: His waeness in the morning is impressive.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate the waeness of the early birds.
meanings.sent3: The waeness of the cat at dawn is amusing.
meanings.sent4: The waeness of the city never truly sleeps.
meanings.sent5: The waeness of the sunrise was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: The state or quality of being aware.
meanings.sent1: Her waeness of her surroundings kept her safe.
meanings.sent2: The waeness of the students in class was evident.
meanings.sent3: The waeness of the dog to treats is amusing.
meanings.sent4: The waeness of the situation hit him suddenly.
meanings.sent5: The waeness of the danger made her cautious.

meanings.definition: The state or quality of being watchful.
meanings.sent1: The guard's waeness prevented any intruders.
meanings.sent2: The waeness of the hikers in the forest was necessary.
meanings.sent3: The waeness of the owl to mice is amusing.
meanings.sent4: The waeness of the storm approaching was alarming.
meanings.sent5: The waeness of the sentry never wavered.
